name: Soap Slide
description:
You're just an old man going for a nice shower... When you step on a soap, hit your head on the toilet and DIE! Your last thought was "Oh, how I hate soaps..." But the resurrection cycle goes crazy and turned you into a SOAP!

Now you are in a male's dressing room shower and have to escape from the hands and feet trying to rub you on their... PARTS!

Keep yourself away from them, the soap is OUT OF CONTROL!
